mapper.select: SELECT STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_PWD ,STAFF_EMAIL,STAFF_TYPE FROM staff WHERE staffId=#{staffId}
SELECT STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_PWD ,STAFF_EMAIL,STAFF_TYPE FROM staff WHERE staffId=#{staffId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff (STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_PWD ,STAFF_EMAIL,STAFF_TYPE) VALUES (#{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{staffPwd}, #{staffEmail}, #{staffType})
